ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/azure-files-samples
Language: powershell
This repository contains supporting code (PowerShell modules/scripts, ARM templates, etc.) for deploying, configuring, and using Azure Files.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Azure/Enterprise-Scale

The Azure Landing Zones (Enterprise-Scale) architecture provides prescriptive guidance coupled with Azure best practices, and it follows design principles across the critical design areas for organizations to define their Azure architecture

ns0:entry.ns0:content:
